values.name: Jira Data Acquisition
values.summary: Create a Jira project repository for See Scrum and extract data from the repository into the See Scrum application

values.name: Git Data Acquisition
values.summary: Create a Git source code repository for See Scrum and extract data from the repository into the See Scrum application

values.name: Scrum Project Visualization
values.summary: Create innovative interactive visualizations of Jira and Git data

values.name: Sprint Planning Analytics
values.summary: Analyze the Sprint Backlog data and generate alerts to the Scrum Master for stories which match typical anti-patterns

values.name: Data Ingestion
values.summary: Ingest data from Jira, Git, and the Retrospective Tool

values.name: Hardware Acquisition
values.summary: Purchase all computer, audio, and video equipment required for See Scrum

values.name: Scrum Tutorial Videos
values.summary: Plan, film, and edit Scrum tutorial videos

values.name: Software Acquisition
values.summary: Purchase and install all software needed for See Scrum

values.name: Social Media
values.summary: Create social media delivery for See Scrum, including YouTube and Vimeo Channels as well as a Facebook page and a Twitter account

values.name: Word Press Site
values.summary: Deliver training content, a Scrum blog and "About" info via a Word Press site

values.name: SonarQube Data Acquisition
values.summary: Create a SonarQube project for See Scrum
